description: Describe Elasticsearch Limits for a given InstanceType and ElasticsearchVersion. When modifying existing Domain, specify the DomainName to know what Limits are supported for modifying.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description: The instance type for an Elasticsearch cluster for which Elasticsearch Limits are needed.

parameters.name: ElasticsearchVersion
parameters.description: Version of Elasticsearch for which Limits are needed.

nested_items.name: LimitsByRole
nested_items.description: Map of Role of the Instance and Limits that are applicable. Role performed by given Instance in Elasticsearch can be one of the following:
data: If the given InstanceType is used as data node.
master: If the given InstanceType is used as master node.
ultra_warm: If the given InstanceType is used as warm node.
